title: $:/plugins/tg/exploration
text:
{ "tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/button": { "created": "20170510135141908", "text": "\\define explore-button(class)\n<$button tooltip=\"Explore in new window\" class=\"\"\"$(tv-config-toolbar-class)$ $class$\"\"\">\n<$list filter=\"[prefix[yes]]\">\n<$action-sendmessage $message=\"tm-open-window\" $param=\"$:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration\" height=\"700px\" width=\"500px\"/>\n{{$:/plugins/tg/exploration/icon}}\n\n<$list filter=\"[prefix[yes]]\">\n<$text text=\"explore\"/>\n\n\n\\end\n\n<$list filter=\"[list[$:/StoryList]] +[field:title[$:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration]]\" emptyMessage=<>>\n<>\n\n\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/button", "tags": "$:/tags/PageControls", "modified": "20191229161451408", "description": "Explore TW5", "caption": "{{$:/plugins/tg/exploration/icon}} explore" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code1": { "created": "20141001084921772", "text": "!! [[Code1|$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code1]]\n<>\n\n<$macrocall $name=\"codefilter\" filter={{$:/temp/filter/code1}} state=\"code1\"/>\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code1", "tags": "$:/tags/xcode", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229161517619", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Code1" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code2": { "created": "20141001084954911", "text": "!! [[Code2|$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code2]]\n<>\n\n<$macrocall $name=\"codefilter\" filter={{$:/temp/filter/code2}} state=\"code2\"/>", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code2", "tags": "$:/tags/xcode", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229161535662", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Code2" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code3": { "created": "20141001090009472", "text": "!! [[Code3|$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code3]]\n<>\n\n<$macrocall $name=\"codefilter\" filter={{$:/temp/filter/code3}} state=\"code3\"/>", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code3", "tags": "$:/tags/xcode", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229161554882", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Code3" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code4": { "created": "20141001091735182", "text": "!! [[Code4|$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code4]]\n<>\n\n<$macrocall $name=\"codefilter\" filter={{$:/temp/filter/code4}} state=\"code4\"/>\n\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code4", "tags": "$:/tags/xcode", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229161613529", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Code4" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code5": { "created": "20141031144255930", "text": "!! [[Code5|$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code5]]\n<>\n\n<$macrocall $name=\"codefilter\" filter={{$:/temp/filter/code5}} state=\"code5\"/>", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/code5", "tags": "$:/tags/xcode", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229161630749", "creator": "TonGerner", "caption": "Code5" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration": { "created": "20140714115927407", "text": "!!!Exploration\n<>", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/exploration", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20221228115757843", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/buttons": { "created": "20141020201907464", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/buttons", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162300142", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/ui/Buttons]]", "description": "Buttons", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/code-snippets": { "created": "20140923160624756", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/code-snippets", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229161812075", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/snippets]]", "description": "Code snippets", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/configuration": { "created": "20141005142753238", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/configuration", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229161832634", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/config]]", "description": "Configuration tiddlers", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/core-images": { "created": "20141025095607867", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/core-images", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229161855341", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/images]]", "description": "Core images", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/core-macros": { "created": "20140923160458155", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/core-macros", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229161917503", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/macros]]", "description": "Core macros", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/editor-toolbar-buttons": { "created": "20161204175036367", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/editor-toolbar-buttons", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162322945", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar]]", "description": "Editor toolbar buttons", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/howto": { "created": "20150708095918463", "text": "Default the list of filters contains:\n\n# Buttons (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/ui/Buttons]]`)\n# Code snippets (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/snippets]]`)\n# Configuration tiddlers (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/config]]`)\n# Core images (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/images]]`)\n# Core macros (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/macros]]`)\n# Editor toolbar buttons (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/ui/EditorToolbar]]`)\n# Plugins (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/plugins]]`)\n# Shadow ui tiddlers (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/ui]]`)\n# Templates (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/templates]]`)\n# Themes (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/themes]]`)\n# Widgets (`[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/modules/widgets]]`)\n\nTo add a filter to the list:\n\n* Create a tiddler tagged with `$:/tags/codeFilter`\n* Add a field `description` which contains the name of the filter to be seen in the list\n* Add a field `filter` which contains the filter you want to add to the list\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/howto", "tags": "", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162006472", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/javascript-macros": { "created": "20190203185551806", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/javascript-macros", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162022534", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/modules/macros/]]", "description": "Javascript macros", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/javascript-modules": { "created": "20161107123227543", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/javascript-modules", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162037928", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/modules]]", "description": "Javascript modules", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/languages": { "created": "20190203185817539", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/languages", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162052870", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/language/]]", "description": "Language tiddlers", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/plugins": { "created": "20170324171715717", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/plugins", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162338672", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/plugins]]", "description": "Plugins", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/shadow-ui": { "created": "20140923154305534", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/shadow-ui", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162128861", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/ui]]", "description": "Shadow ui tiddlers", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/templates": { "created": "20170324172714778", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/templates", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162149150", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/templates]]", "description": "Templates", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/themes": { "created": "20140923160800468", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/themes", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162205439", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/themes]]", "description": "Themes", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/widgets": { "created": "20141005142452796", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/widgets", "tags": "$:/tags/codeFilter", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162359445", "filter": "[all[shadows]sort[title]]+[prefix[$:/core/modules/widgets]]", "description": "Widgets", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/help": { "created": "20170510130615844", "text": "!! Help\n* To explore ~WikiText core tiddlers like the UI shadow tiddlers, code snippets, macros, themes and so on, select a filter and then the appropriate tiddler from the list\n* The five 'Code' tabs can contain/remember earlier results.\n* You can choose a filter from the list or add a filter manually\n** Default the list of filters contains <$count filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/codeFilter]]\"/> filters but you can add your own filters to the list, see [[How to add a filter to the list|$:/plugins/tg/exploration/filter/howto]]\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/help", "tags": "", "modified": "20191231181254485", "caption": "Help" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/icon": { "created": "20170510133330608", "text": "", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/icon", "tags": "", "modified": "20191229162436475" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/license": { "created": "20180125141040743", "text": "[[Exploration plugin|http://www.tongerner.nl/TW5/TW5_playground.html]] © Ton Gerner — 2018-2023\n\nMIT License: https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/license", "tags": "", "modified": "20221228114745118" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/codefilter": { "created": "20140728113918255", "text": "\\define codefilter(filter, state)\n<$select tiddler='$:/state/$state$/list'>\n<$list filter=\"$filter$\">\n\n\n\n\n''Tiddler:'' <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/$state$/list}}>\n<$link to={{$:/state/$state$/list}}>\n\n<$view field=\"title\"/>\n\n''Source code:''\n
<$view field=\"text\"/>
\n
\n''Renders as:''\n<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/$state$/list}}>\n<$transclude mode='block'/>\n\n
\n''Fields:''\n<$transclude tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/TiddlerFields\"/>\n\\end\n\n```\n\\define codefilter(filter, state)\n<$select tiddler='$:/state/$state$/list'>\n<$list filter=\"$filter$\">\n\n\n\n\n''Tiddler:'' <$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/$state$/list}}>\n<$link to={{$:/state/$state$/list}}>\n\n<$view field=\"title\"/>\n\n''Source code:''\n
<$view field=\"text\"/>
\n
\n''Renders as:''\n<$tiddler tiddler={{$:/state/$state$/list}}>\n<$transclude mode='block'/>\n\n
\n''Fields:''\n<$transclude tiddler=\"$:/core/ui/TiddlerFields\"/>\n\\end\n```\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/codefilter", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162542006", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/selectfilter": { "created": "20141001090916471", "text": "\\define selectfilter(filter)\n<$linkcatcher to=\"$:/temp/filter/$filter$\">\n\n''Select via a filter expression''\n\n
<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/temp/filter/$filter$\" type=\"search\" tag=\"input\"/> <$button popup=<> class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=\"$:/temp/filter/$filter$\" type=\"nomatch\" text=\"\"> <$link to=\"\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
\n\n
\n<$reveal state=<> type=\"nomatch\" text=\"\" default=\"\">\n
\n<$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/codeFilter]]\"><$link to={{!!filter}}><$transclude field=\"description\"/>\n\n
\n\n
\n\n\n''Select tiddler''\n\\end\n\n```\n\\define selectfilter(filter)\n<$linkcatcher to=\"$:/temp/filter/$filter$\">\n\n''Select via a filter expression''\n\n
<$edit-text tiddler=\"$:/temp/filter/$filter$\" type=\"search\" tag=\"input\"/> <$button popup=<> class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">{{$:/core/images/down-arrow}} <$reveal state=\"$:/temp/filter/$filter$\" type=\"nomatch\" text=\"\"> <$link to=\"\" class=\"tc-btn-invisible\">{{$:/core/images/close-button}}
\n\n
\n<$reveal state=<> type=\"nomatch\" text=\"\" default=\"\">\n
\n<$list filter=\"[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/codeFilter]]\"><$link to={{!!filter}}><$transclude field=\"description\"/>\n\n
\n\n
\n\n\n''Select tiddler''\n\\end\n```\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/macros/selectfilter", "tags": "$:/tags/Macro", "modifier": "TonGerner", "modified": "20191229162622735", "creator": "TonGerner" }, "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/readme": { "created": "20170510120822070", "text": "It is always good to have a look at the code/~WikiText TW uses in the core tiddlers and learn from it.
\nWith this plugin you can explore code/~WikiText core tiddlers like the UI shadow tiddlers, code snippets, macros, themes and so on.\n", "title": "$:/plugins/tg/exploration/readme", "tags": "", "modified": "20191229162641793" } } }
author: TonGerner
name: Exploration
